nodes.text: The Gorgorror was a starship, millennia old and considered a ghost ship at the time of the Galactic Civil War.
The Gorgorror was an egg-shaped nave made from biometallic material. Since its construction, it absorbed many starships, some of them still being apparent on the external hull.

The Gorgorror was created by Christophe Debien and Patrick Bousquet for the ambiguously canon roleplaying scenario "La légende des cristaux," which appeared in the French magazine Casus Belli 76. It was illustrated by Igor Chevallier and Cyrille Daujean.
